name: Spacefight (lukehut)
description:
Spacefight is a game about shooting someone down, in space.

It's got:

- Black holes!

- Vengeful turrets!!

- TWO weapons to choose from!

- An afterburner YOU CAN'T REALLY CHOOSE

Some controller support!

- Xbox One/360!

- PS3/4!

- Logitech F310!!

Art by @Coleman811!

Pay more than $0 to get emailed about future releases!
